comment: For a given uniform structure ` U ` on a set ` X ` , there is a unique topology ` j ` such that the set ` ran ( v e. U |-> ( v " { p } ) ) ` is the filter of the neighborhoods of ` p ` for that topology. Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.3. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Jan-2018.)
